name: PoPuP
description:
Let's Create a Paper World Amusement Park!
Our game PoPuP, which started with this little thought, is now our own identity!
The main play of the game is to help the main character Robin venture into a paper amusement park, collect all the parts and recreate the circus.

When you start the game, it starts in the forest, and when you get to the amusement park through the forest, the ticket agent tells you that the circus has collapsed.

The main character Robin can move by pulling an item or hanging on a specific section with the power of his flute or arm.

If you collect parts beyond various puzzles and traps and move across a large lake, you will meet Boss Corinth.
If you run away from Corinth and defeat him, you can rebuild the circus again.

Adventure a beautiful paper amusement park with Robin and rebuild the circus!
